steps.title: Draw a circle with a triangle for the head.
steps.content: Draw a circle with a triangle for the head. Sketch in guidelines for the face.

steps.title: Draw two big circles for the ears.
steps.content: Draw two big circles for the ears. Then add another circle for the eyes and another one for the nose.

steps.title: Draw two circles.
steps.content: Draw two circles. They should be approximately the same size, but have one overlap the other nearly in the middle of it.

steps.title: For the legs, draw two small ovals each with a larger set for the back legs.
steps.content: For the legs, draw two small ovals each with a larger set for the back legs. Add in two small circles each with small fingers for the paws.

steps.title: Draw a long, thin tail.
steps.content: Draw a long, thin tail. Draw it in an arc on the ground so it looks more realistic.

steps.title: Add in details like the whiskers and tiny claws.
steps.content: Add in details like the whiskers and tiny claws. Outline your mouse and remove any unnecessary guidelines.

steps.title: Color in your drawing.
steps.content: Color in your drawing. Mice are typically white, grey, black, or brown, but if yours is a cartoon (like from Cinderella ) you might want to vary the fur color and even give your mouse a few articles of clothing.

steps.title: Draw two circles of different size and an oval which are overlapping each other.
steps.content: Draw two circles of different size and an oval which are overlapping each other. This will form the framework for the mouse’s head and body.

steps.title: Draw the details for the mouse’s limbs using curves which extend from the oval and the second circle.
steps.content: Draw the details for the mouse’s limbs using curves which extend from the oval and the second circle.

steps.title: Draw the slender tail using curve lines.
steps.content: Draw the slender tail using curve lines. Draw curve lines along the tail to indicate divisions.

steps.title: Draw the big ears using simple curves and add details for the fur.
steps.content: Draw the big ears using simple curves and add details for the fur.

steps.title: Draw details for the mouse’s face including the nose, mouth, and large front teeth.
steps.content: Draw details for the mouse’s face including the nose, mouth, and large front teeth.

steps.title: Draw details around the face including the brows and snout.
steps.content: Draw details around the face including the brows and snout. Draw details for the eyes.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines. Add details for the body.

steps.title: Color to your liking.
steps.content: Color to your liking.

steps.title: Draw two circles of different sizes for the framework.
steps.content: Draw two circles of different sizes for the framework. The first circle is smaller compared to the other one.

steps.title: Draw the details for the mouse’s head.
steps.content: Draw the details for the mouse’s head. Draw a triangle from the circle to form the snout. Draw two small ovals around the head for the ears. Draw a small circle for the mouse’s visible eye.

steps.title: Refine the head using curve lines.
steps.content: Refine the head using curve lines. Draw details for the nose and ears.

steps.title: Draw curve lines to connect to the other circle and to form the body.
steps.content: Draw curve lines to connect to the other circle and to form the body. Draw also the details for the mouse’s legs.

steps.title: Draw the mouse’s slender but long tail using curve lines.
steps.content: Draw the mouse’s slender but long tail using curve lines.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines. Draw details to indicate the fur.

steps.title: Color according to your liking.
steps.content: Color according to your liking.
